summary: The package implements a complete workflow for N-body physics simulation using graph neural networks. It generates particle trajectories, converts them into graph representations, provides dataset handling and collating utilities, defines interaction‑network and related models, and includes a training script that can run on CPU/GPU, evaluate performance, and optionally create visualizations of the simulated dynamics.
business_intent: To serve as a reference implementation and benchmark for researchers and engineers exploring graph‑based deep learning on physical systems, enabling rapid experimentation with Interaction Network models and related architectures on synthetic N-body data.
